These agreements are expected to generate new aircraft orders, potentially aiding Boeing's recovery. However, experts question the extent of Trump's influence, suggesting that many orders would have materialized regardless.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/aircraft-crashes-to-regulatory-hurdles-despite-several-challenges-boeing-may-be-benefitting-big-from-donald-trumps-trade-war/articleshow/122958617.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/aircraft-crashes-to-regulatory-hurdles-despite-several-challenges-boeing-may-be-benefitting-big-from-donald-trumps-trade-war/articleshow/122958617.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:00:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68400" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122958660,imgsize-68400.cms"/></item><item><title>Only 3 of 190 nations which are part of UN opposed Op Sindoor, says Jaishankar - Top quotes</title><description><![CDATA[External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar addressed the Lok Sabha regarding the government's response to the Pahalgam attack and Operation Sindoor. He highlighted India's zero-tolerance stance on terrorism. Jaishankar mentioned global support received post-attack. He criticized past governments' inaction after 26/11. The minister also spoke about India's strengthened regional ties and engagement with the UN Security Council.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/only-3-of-190-nations-which-are-part-of-un-opposed-operation-sindoor-says-jaishankar-top-quotes/articleshow/122956721.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/only-3-of-190-nations-which-are-part-of-un-opposed-operation-sindoor-says-jaishankar-top-quotes/articleshow/122956721.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 20:29:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52442" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122956730,imgsize-52442.cms"/></item><item><title>Ex-Google AI engineer shares his experience after joining Microsoft: ‘I’m already …’</title><description><![CDATA[Amar Subramanya, previously at Google, has joined Microsoft as Corporate VP of AI. He appreciates Microsoft's collaborative and ambitious culture. Subramanya highlights the company's focus on AI foundation models and Microsoft Copilot. Other DeepMind team members have also reportedly joined Microsoft. This hiring trend reflects the competitive AI landscape. Microsoft's leadership is committed to advancing AI technology.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/ex-google-ai-engineer-amar-subramanya-shares-his-first-week-experience-after-joining-microsoft-im-already-feeling/articleshow/122956429.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/ex-google-ai-engineer-amar-subramanya-shares-his-first-week-experience-after-joining-microsoft-im-already-feeling/articleshow/122956429.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 20:06:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="71278" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122956418,imgsize-71278.cms"/></item><item><title>When Pakistan Test team left the ground leaving Gavaskar stranded at 86</title><description><![CDATA[An old controversy resurfaced as parallels are drawn to the Stokes-Jadeja incident. In the 1983 Bangalore Test, Pakistan's captain Zaheer Abbas controversially left the field, halting play for nearly half an hour and leaving Sunil Gavaskar stranded. Gavaskar, battling illness, eventually completed his century amidst the drama, with teammates and officials questioning Zaheer's sportsmanship.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/when-pakistan-test-team-left-the-ground-leaving-gavaskar-stranded-at-86/articleshow/122958663.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/when-pakistan-test-team-left-the-ground-leaving-gavaskar-stranded-at-86/articleshow/122958663.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 22:56:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AVIJIT GHOSH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="75166" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122958705,imgsize-75166.cms"/></item><item><title>Cambodia–Thailand ceasefire: Trump takes credit; declares himself 'prez of peace'</title><description><![CDATA[US President Donald Trump claimed credit for brokering a ceasefire between Cambodia and Thailand, following deadly clashes along their disputed border. The truce, officially declared in Kuala Lumpur under Malaysian mediation, aims to halt the fighting that displaced thousands. While sporadic clashes persisted, Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Manet thanked Trump for his support.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/cambodiathailand-ceasefire-donald-trump-takes-credit-declares-himself-president-of-peace/articleshow/122957254.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/cambodiathailand-ceasefire-donald-trump-takes-credit-declares-himself-president-of-peace/articleshow/122957254.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 21:17:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="867033" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122957261,imgsize-867033.cms"/></item><item><title>Operation Mahadev: 'Pahalgam attack mastermind' among 3 terrorists killed</title><description><![CDATA[In Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir, security forces neutralized three terrorists in an intense firefight near Dachigam National Park. The operation, dubbed "Operation Mahadev," follows reports linking the terrorists to the April 22 Pahalgam attack, where numerous tourists and a local resident were killed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-mahadev-pahalgam-attack-mastermind-among-3-terrorists-killed-what-we-know/articleshow/122950886.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-mahadev-pahalgam-attack-mastermind-among-3-terrorists-killed-what-we-know/articleshow/122950886.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 16:24:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="9666" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122952786,imgsize-9666.cms"/></item><item><title>Zuckerberg appoints ChatGPT co-creator Shengjia Zhao as chief scientist of Meta’s AI lab</title><description><![CDATA[Mark Zuckerberg has announced Shengjia Zhao as the chief scientist of Meta Superintelligence Labs. Zhao co-created ChatGPT. He also played a key role in developing GPT-4. Meta has invested heavily in AI talent acquisition. The company has hired talents from Google, OpenAI, Apple and Anthropic. Meta will also spend billions on AI data centers in the US.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-appoints-shengjia-zhao-who-co-created-openais-chatgpt-as-chief-scientist-of-metas-ai-superintelligence-lab/articleshow/122918120.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-appoints-shengjia-zhao-who-co-created-openais-chatgpt-as-chief-scientist-of-metas-ai-superintelligence-lab/articleshow/122918120.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 26 Jul 2025 11:32:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="91716" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122918111,imgsize-91716.cms"/></item><item><title>BJP's Panda takes a swipe at Cong with Tharoor mention - 'No one could stop him from ...'</title><description><![CDATA[During the Lok Sabha debate on Operation Sindoor, BJP leader Baijayant Panda criticized Congress, pointedly mentioning Shashi Tharoor. Panda suggested the discussion would be more engaging if Congress allowed its capable speakers, like Tharoor, to participate freely. He noted Tharoor's eloquence and expressed pleasure that he spoke in the national interest despite perceived restrictions from his own party leadership.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-sindoor-debate-bjps-baijayant-panda-takes-a-swipe-at-congress-with-shashi-tharoor-mention-no-one-could-stop-him/articleshow/122954448.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-sindoor-debate-bjps-baijayant-panda-takes-a-swipe-at-congress-with-shashi-tharoor-mention-no-one-could-stop-him/articleshow/122954448.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 18:08:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45004" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122954526,imgsize-45004.cms"/></item><item><title>Nevada shooting: Multiple people injured after gunfire at Reno Casino Resort</title><description><![CDATA[A shooting occurred at Grand Sierra Resort in Reno. The incident happened on Monday morning. Several people sustained injuries. Police responded to reports of an active shooter. An adult male suspect is now in custody. He was taken to a local hospital. The police exchanged gunfire with the suspect. Authorities say there is no ongoing threat.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/nevada-shooting-multiple-people-injured-after-gunfire-at-reno-casino-resort-suspect-held/articleshow/122958277.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/nevada-shooting-multiple-people-injured-after-gunfire-at-reno-casino-resort-suspect-held/articleshow/122958277.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 22:33:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="571175" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122958315,imgsize-571175.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Geoffrey Boycott takes a swipe at Ben Stokes - 'There is no way...'</title><description><![CDATA[Geoffrey Boycott has criticized Ben Stokes and the England team for perceived poor sportsmanship during the Manchester Test's final day. Boycott questioned Stokes' decision to offer a handshake, suggesting Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar deserved the chance to complete their centuries. He also highlighted England's bowling deficiencies, noting that Stokes himself was their best bowler in both innings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-geoffrey-boycott-takes-a-swipe-at-ben-stokes-there-is-no-way-/articleshow/122957490.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-geoffrey-boycott-takes-a-swipe-at-ben-stokes-there-is-no-way-/articleshow/122957490.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 21:42:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="162668" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122957497,imgsize-162668.cms"/></item><item><title>BlackRock to staff: You cannot carry your phones & laptops to China, instead ...</title><description><![CDATA[BlackRock is restricting employees' use of company-issued devices in China due to rising US-China tensions and data security concerns. Staff must now use temporary loaner phones and cannot use company laptops, reflecting broader anxieties about operating in China's complex regulatory environment. This follows incidents of Western business executives facing travel restrictions and stricter data security laws.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/worlds-largest-asset-manager-blackrock-to-employees-you-cannot-carry-your-phones-and-laptops-to-china-instead-/articleshow/122841635.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/worlds-largest-asset-manager-blackrock-to-employees-you-cannot-carry-your-phones-and-laptops-to-china-instead-/articleshow/122841635.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 22 Jul 2025 22:09:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="7950" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122841601,imgsize-7950.cms"/></item><item><title>Luka Doncic's stunning weight loss earns Men's Health Cover</title><description><![CDATA[Luka Doncic, traded by the Mavericks partly over fitness concerns, now sports a remarkable physique on Men's Health, signaling a new chapter with the Lakers. A Smith County judge granted the request, allowing Mahomes Sr. to support his son, Patrick Mahomes, at the game.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-sr-escapes-travel-ban-with-court-approval-to-support-son-in-chiefs-arizona-showdown/articleshow/122936151.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-sr-escapes-travel-ban-with-court-approval-to-support-son-in-chiefs-arizona-showdown/articleshow/122936151.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 18:42:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1363677" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122936138,imgsize-1363677.cms"/></item><item><title>Christian Gonzalez: Limp exits after covering Diggs at camp</title><description><![CDATA[During Monday's training camp, Patriots' star cornerback Christian Gonzalez sustained a leg injury while covering Stefon Diggs, raising concerns for the team's defense. His health is crucial for a potential bounce-back season in 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/christian-gonzalez-injury-update-patriots-cornerback-limps-off-after-covering-stefon-diggs-at-2025-training-camp/articleshow/122958571.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/christian-gonzalez-injury-update-patriots-cornerback-limps-off-after-covering-stefon-diggs-at-2025-training-camp/articleshow/122958571.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46836" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122958902,imgsize-46836.cms"/></item><item><title>'They trust others more than own ministers': Shah intervenes during EAM's speech to target oppn</title><description><![CDATA[During a Lok Sabha debate on Operation Sindoor, Union minister Amit Shah criticized the opposition for disrupting S Jaishankar's speech, alleging they trust foreign narratives more than Indian ministers. Jaishankar outlined India's firm response to the Pahalgam attack, including suspending the Indus Waters Treaty and reducing Pakistani High Commission staff.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/they-trust-others-more-than-indias-own-ministers-amit-shah-gets-up-twice-during-jaishankars-speech-slams-opposition-for-disruption-in-lok-sabha/articleshow/122955109.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/they-trust-others-more-than-indias-own-ministers-amit-shah-gets-up-twice-during-jaishankars-speech-slams-opposition-for-disruption-in-lok-sabha/articleshow/122955109.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 19:47:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60000" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122956158,imgsize-60000.cms"/></item><item><title>'At no stage in talks with US ... ': EAM shreds Trump’s 'trade' claim; explains ceasefire trigger</title><description><![CDATA[External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar refuted Donald Trump's assertion that trade negotiations facilitated a ceasefire between India and Pakistan. Jaishankar clarified in Lok Sabha that no such linkage existed in discussions with the US. He also criticized the Congress party's past actions while highlighting the government's success in addressing terror sites and designating TRF as a global terrorist organization.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/at-no-stage-in-talks-with-us-jaishankar-shreds-trumps-trade-claim-explains-ceasefire-trigger/articleshow/122955572.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/at-no-stage-in-talks-with-us-jaishankar-shreds-trumps-trade-claim-explains-ceasefire-trigger/articleshow/122955572.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 19:50:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51476" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122956094,imgsize-51476.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Ex-India cricketer slams Gambhir's tactics – 'Take a chill pill'</title><description><![CDATA[Sanjay Manjrekar has criticized Gautam Gambhir's coaching during the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, citing "poor tactics" and "questionable selections." Madhampatty Rangaraj was previously married to Shruti.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/all-you-need-to-know-about-madhampatty-rangarajs-secret-wedding-to-joy-crizildaa-first-marriage-rumours-second-marriage-to-pregnancy-announcement-explained/articleshow/122954254.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/all-you-need-to-know-about-madhampatty-rangarajs-secret-wedding-to-joy-crizildaa-first-marriage-rumours-second-marriage-to-pregnancy-announcement-explained/articleshow/122954254.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 17:45:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="113046" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122954237,imgsize-113046.cms"/></item><item><title>Arshdeep Singh teases England with 'ho gai teri balle balle' moves after Old Trafford draw</title><description><![CDATA[India celebrated a moral victory after drawing the fourth Test against England at Old Trafford, highlighted by a resilient batting performance. A video of him dancing, showing off his Bhangra moves up the stairs went viral, showcasing the team's positive energy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/arshdeep-singh-teases-england-with-ho-gai-teri-balle-balle-moves-after-old-trafford-draw/articleshow/122952164.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/arshdeep-singh-teases-england-with-ho-gai-teri-balle-balle-moves-after-old-trafford-draw/articleshow/122952164.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 16:20:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30502" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122952301,imgsize-30502.cms"/></item><item><title>'Immediate and unconditional' ceasefire: Thailand & Cambodia agree for truce</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/immediate-and-unconditional-ceasefire-thailand-cambodia-agree-for-truce-malaysian-pm-anwar-ibrahim-announces/articleshow/122951909.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/immediate-and-unconditional-ceasefire-thailand-cambodia-agree-for-truce-malaysian-pm-anwar-ibrahim-announces/articleshow/122951909.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 15:57:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28380" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122952065,imgsize-28380.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Divya breaks down in tears, hugs mother after historic World Cup win</title><description><![CDATA[Divya Deshmukh, a 19-year-old chess prodigy, achieved a stunning victory at the FIDE Women’s World Cup, defeating Koneru Humpy in a thrilling tie-break. This triumph not only secured her the championship but also earned her the coveted Grandmaster title, making her India's fourth woman to reach this milestone.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/watch-19-year-old-divya-deshmukh-breaks-down-in-tears-hugs-mother-after-historic-world-cup-win/articleshow/122953025.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/watch-19-year-old-divya-deshmukh-breaks-down-in-tears-hugs-mother-after-historic-world-cup-win/articleshow/122953025.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 16:49:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="66904" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122953190,imgsize-66904.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[ICICI Bank leads Q1 earnings among private banks, Kotak and Axis lag behind]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/icici-hdfc-axis-kotak-bank-q1-growth-earnings-analysis-19644890.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[ICICI Bank has topped the charts among large private sector lenders in the first quarter earnings, with strong loan growth, stable margins, and healthy asset quality. In contrast, Kotak Mahindra Bank and Axis Bank lagged behind due to weak loan mix, higher credit costs, and declining return ratios.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:36:55 +0530]]></pubDate>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.       <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/tata-capital-ipo-valuation-raised-drhp-filing-19642326.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week. Tata Capital plans to raise around $2 billion through the IPO, which is expected to launch in the first half of September this year. The IPO is being driven by a regulatory mandate. In September 2022, the Reserve Bank of India classified Tata Capital as an upper-layer systemically important NBFC, requiring it to go public within three years.       <description><![CDATA[IREDA will remain exclusively focused on the renewable energy sector, with no plans to diversify, CMD Pradip Kumar Das told CNBC-TV18.       <title><![CDATA[Select Committee presents report on New Income Tax Bill in Lok Sabha]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/finance/new-income-tax-bill-2025-select-committee-of-parliament-submits-report-lok-sabha-19640397.htm]]></link>
